title: Priyanka Chopra Looks Red Hot As Victoria Leeds In New 'Baywatch' Poster

organizations.name: priyanka chopra looks red hot as victoria leeds
poster priyanka chopra looks red hot as victoria leeds

text:
Priyanka Chopra Looks Red Hot As Victoria Leeds In New 'Baywatch' Poster "Being bad can be so good." 23/02/2017 10:58 AM IST | Updated 10 minutes ago Priyanka Chopra/ Twitter ADVERTISEMENT 
NEW DELHI -- The one actress who believes being bad can be 'so good' is none other than Bollywood's Desi girl Priyanka Chopra. 
The global star, who is all set for her Hollywood debut, recently shared a scintillating poster from Baywatch saying, "Being bad can be so good. Coming soon.. #VictoriaLeeds #Baywatch #may26th." â€” PRIYANKA (@priyankachopra) February 22, 2017 
Donning a red off-shoulder dress, Priyanka looks hot as Victoria Leeds in the new poster. 
The Seth Gordon-directorial is based on the television series of the same name and stars Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario, Kelly Rohrbach, Jon Bass, Ilfenesh Hadera, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, David Hasselhoff and Pamela Anderson.
